mapper.select: SELECT S.SIGN_PK, S.SIGN_TITLE, S.SIGN_CONTENT, S.SIGN_DATE, S.SIGN_RESERV_YEAR, S.SIGN_DOCTYPE, S.MEMBER_PK, S.ADOPT_PK, A.ADOPT_NM, A.ADOPT_BDATE, A.ADOPT_SPECIES, A.ADOPT_BREED, A.ADOPT_WEIGHT, A.ADOPT_SEX, A.ADOPT_NEUT, A.MASTERPK, A.ADOPT_REASON, L.LV_1, L.LV_2, L.LV_3, L.MEMBER_PK, L.SIGN_STATE FROM SIGN2_TEST S JOIN SIGN_ADOPT_TEST A ON S.ADOPT_PK = A.ADOPT_PK JOIN SIGN_LINE2_TEST L ON S.SIGN_PK = L.SIGN_PK INNER JOIN USER_TEST5 U ON U.MEMBER_PK = S.MEMBER_PK WHERE S.MEMBER_PK = #{userPK}

SELECT S.SIGN_PK, S.SIGN_TITLE, S.SIGN_CONTENT, S.SIGN_DATE, S.SIGN_RESERV_YEAR, S.SIGN_DOCTYPE, S.MEMBER_PK, S.ADOPT_PK, A.ADOPT_NM, A.ADOPT_BDATE, A.ADOPT_SPECIES, A.ADOPT_BREED, A.ADOPT_WEIGHT, A.ADOPT_SEX, A.ADOPT_NEUT, A.MASTERPK, A.ADOPT_REASON, L.LV_1, L.LV_2, L.LV_3, L.MEMBER_PK, L.SIGN_STATE FROM SIGN2_TEST S JOIN SIGN_ADOPT_TEST A ON S.ADOPT_PK = A.ADOPT_PK JOIN SIGN_LINE2_TEST L ON S.SIGN_PK = L.SIGN_PK INNER JOIN USER_TEST5 U ON U.MEMBER_PK = S.MEMBER_PK
